overview:
Marco Oonk is an experienced executive having held senior management positions in the Stock Photography industry for the last 15 years. He worked at the World’s largest photography company Getty Images for 10 years in a number of International Director positions before joining Corbis, a Bill Gates owned company leading the UK office first and then the Global Distributors network.

Marco used his extensive experience and network to start Fast Media Magazine which quickly grew to the biggest news blog in the stock photography industry. Fast Media Magazine is part of Picturebuying Ltd, a company that helps picture buyers buy directly from creators of images as well as providing them with information that saves time and money.

Marco also co-owns Picturemedia Ltd, a fast growing business with offices in London and Amsterdam. Picturemedia provides outsourced sales and marketing services to photography distribution companies allowing them to have a direct sales presence.
